class.name: ToriiClient
class.brief_description: A client for interacting with the Torii indexer.
class.description: The ToriiClient class provides methods to query and subscribe to various data from the Torii indexer, such as entities, events, tokens, and transactions.

method.name: achievements
method.description: Queries achievements based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: activities
method.description: Queries activities based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: aggregations
method.description: Queries aggregations based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: cancel_subscription
method.description: Cancels an active subscription using its ID.

method.name: connect
method.description: Connects the client to the specified Torii URL.

method.name: contracts
method.description: Queries contracts based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: controllers
method.description: Queries controllers based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: create
method.description: Creates a new ToriiClient instance connected to the specified Torii URL.

method.name: entities
method.description: Queries entities based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: event_messages
method.description: Queries event messages based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: is_connected
method.description: Checks if the client is connected to the Torii indexer.

method.name: player_achievements
method.description: Queries player achievements based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: publish_message
method.description: Publishes a message to the Torii indexer.

method.name: publish_message_batch
method.description: Publishes a batch of messages to the Torii indexer.

method.name: search
method.description: Performs a search query.

method.name: sql
method.description: Executes a raw SQL query against the Torii indexer.

method.name: starknet_events
method.description: Queries Starknet events based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: subscribe_entity_updates
method.description: Subscribes to entity updates. [codeblock] var _dojo_callback:DojoCallback = DojoCallback.new() _dojo_callback.on_update = callback entity_sub = torii_client.subscribe_entity_updates(DojoClause.new(), ["0x0..."], _dojo_callback) [/codeblock]

method.name: subscribe_event_updates
method.description: Subscribes to event updates.

method.name: subscribe_token_balance_updates
method.description: Subscribes to token balance updates.

method.name: subscribe_token_updates
method.description: Subscribes to token updates.

method.name: subscribe_transaction_updates
method.description: Subscribes to transaction updates.

method.name: token_balances
method.description: Queries token balances based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: token_contracts
method.description: Queries token contracts based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: token_transfers
method.description: Queries token transfers based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: tokens
method.description: Queries tokens based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: transactions
method.description: Queries transactions based on the provided query parameters.

method.name: worlds
method.description: Queries worlds based on the provided world addresses.
